vanillaVillageChance.desc:: Percentage of how likely normal,non-zombie villages are to spawn. default: 0

hostilePopulationSize.desc:: Set higher to increase the generated population of the hostile village, default: 5

generateLoot.desc:: Whether to generate extra loot for the village, default: true

debugLog.desc:: Turn on debug messages for spawning, default: false

disableNoEntityDespawnWhenPickingItem.desc:: Disables entities beeing unable to despawn after they get an item equipped, default: true

loottables.desc:: List of loottables to use, default: minecraft:chests/simple_dungeon

allowVanillaVillagerSpawn.desc:: Whether to allow vanilla villagers to spawn at all. default: false

villagesSpawnEggLoot.desc:: If enabled and vanilla villager spawn is enabled then hostile villages will get a villager spawn egg added to their loot. default: true

villageEntityTypes.desc:: List of entity pairs which spawn in villages. Format = entity1;entity2;5;6   5 is the chance of entity2(one in five), 6 is the total weight of this whole entry to be chosen

additionalStructures.desc:: Additional structures to add as houses for spawning zombie villages, default: []

additionalStructuresWeight.desc:: Set higher to increase the amount of additional structures generated, note those replace houses, default: 2
